TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlArrayItemAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 表示指定 可以放置在序列化数组中的派生类型的特性。

span.span: Represents an attribute that specifies the derived types that the can place in a serialized array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于控制 如何序列化或反序列化对象的一系列属性。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅[控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization). 您可以将 应用到任何返回数组的公共读/写成员，或提供对一个数组的访问。You can apply the to any public read/write member that returns an array, or provides access to one. 例如，返回对象数组的字段、集合、或实现 接口的任何类。For example, a field that returns an array of objects, a collection, an , or any class that implements the interface. 支持多态性，换言之，它允许 将派生对象添加到数组中。The supports polymorphism--in other words, it allows the to add derived objects to an array. 例如，假设名为 `Mammal` 的类派生自名为 `Animal`的基类。For example, suppose a class named `Mammal` is derived from a base class named `Animal`. 进一步假设名为 `MyAnimals` 的类包含一个返回 `Animal` 对象的数组的字段。Further suppose that a class named `MyAnimals` contains a field that returns an array of `Animal` objects. 若要允许 对 `Animal` 和 `Mammal` 类型进行序列化，请将 应用于字段两次，每次指定两个可接受的类型之一。To allow the to serialize both the `Animal` and `Mammal` type, apply the to the field twice, each time specifying one of the two acceptable types. > [!NOTE] > 您可以应用 或 的多个实例，以指定可插入到数组中的对象的类型。You can apply multiple instances of the or to specify types of objects that can be inserted into the array. > [!NOTE] > 不支持对返回接口或接口数组的字段或属性进行序列化。The serialization of a field or property that returns an interface or array of interfaces is not supported. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). > [!NOTE] > 您可以在代码中使用 word `XmlArrayItem` 而不是更长的 。You can use the word `XmlArrayItem` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为 `Group` 的类，该类包含一个名为 `Employees` 的字段，该字段返回 `Employee` 对象的数组。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a field named `Employees` that returns an array of `Employee` objects. 该示例将 应用到字段，从而指示 它可以将基类（`Employee`）类型和派生类类型（`Manager`）的对象插入到序列化的数组中。The example applies the to the field, thereby instructing the that it can insert objects of both the base class (`Employee`) type and derived class type (`Manager`) into the serialized array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为 `Transportation` 的类，该类包含一个名为 `MyVehicles` 的字段，该字段返回 `Vehicle` 对象的数组。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 该示例将 应用到字段，这允许 将派生自 `Vehicle` 类的 `Car` 类的实例插入到数组中。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载设置 属性。This overload sets the property. 如果希望生成的 XML 元素的名称与成员的标识符不同，请使用此重载。Use this overload if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 包含命名空间的 XML 文档可以包含一个或多个元素名称版本。An XML document that includes namespaces can contain more than one version of an element name. 有关详细信息，请参见 属性。For details, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为 `Transportation` 的类，该类包含一个名为 `MyVehicles` 的字段，该字段返回 `Vehicle` 对象的数组。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 该示例将 应用到字段，这允许 将派生自 `Vehicle` 类的 `Car` 类的实例插入到数组中。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. 应用特性时，该示例使用 `elementName` 参数设置 属性。While applying the attribute, the example sets the property using the `elementName` parameter. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的 XML 数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML data type of the generated XML element.

value.span: XML 架构定义（XSD）数据类型。

span.span: An XML schema definition (XSD) data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了具有 .NET 等效项的 XML 架构简单数据类型。The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their .NET equivalents. 对于 XML 架构 `base64Binary` 和 `hexBinary` 数据类型，请使用 对象的数组，并根据需要将 属性设置为 "base64Binary" 或 "hexBinary" 的 应用。For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of objects, and apply an with the property set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. 对于 XML 架构 `time` 和 `date` 数据类型，请使用 类型， 并将 "" 设置为 "日期" 或 "时间"。For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 对于映射到字符串的每个 XML 架构类型，应用 ，并将其 属性设置为 XML 架构类型。For every XML Schema type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XML Schema type. 但是，这不会更改序列化格式，而只会更改成员的架构。However, this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 属性区分大小写，因此必须将其精确设置为 XML 架构数据类型之一。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types. > [!NOTE] > 以 XML 元素的形式传递二进制数据更高效，然后将其作为 XML 特性传递。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient then passing it as an XML attribute. 有关 XML 架构数据类型的详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会文档[XML 架构第2部分：数据](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)类型。For more information about XML Schema data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium document [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/). |XSD 数据类型XSD data type|.NET 数据类型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary| 对象的数组Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |字节byte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |条目ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary| 对象的数组Array of objects| |IDID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |integerinteger|| |languagelanguage|| |longlong|| |名称Name|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |durationduration|| |stringstring|| |shortshort|| |timetime|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples 下面的示例将名为 `PurchaseOrder`的类进行序列化。The following example serializes a class named `PurchaseOrder`. 类的多个实例应用于三个成员，且每个实例的 属性都设置为数组中允许的类型。Several instances of the class are applied to three members, and the property for each instance is set to a type allowed in the array. [!code-cpp[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/arrayitem.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/arrayitem.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/arrayitem.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the generated XML element.

value.span: 生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the generated XML element.
The default is the member identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望生成的 XML 元素的名称与成员的标识符不同，请指定 。Specify an if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 如果生成的 XML 文档使用 XML 命名空间来区分名称相同的成员，则可以将相同的 值设置为多个类成员。You can set the same value to more than one class member if the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between identically named members. 有关如何在 XML 文档中使用命名空间和带前缀名称的详细信息，请参阅 类。For details about how to use namespaces and prefixed names in the XML document, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例设置 `Vehicle` 和 `Car` 类的 属性，从而更改 为这些类生成的 XML 元素的名称。The following example sets the property for the `Vehicle` and `Car` class--thereby changing the names of XML elements that the generates for those classes. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示生成的 XML 元素的名称是否是限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the name of the generated XML element is qualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性根据[xml 中万维网联合会规范命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/)，确定 xml 元素名称是否是限定的。The property determines whether an XML element name is qualified, based on the World Wide Web Consortium specification [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/). 如果 属性设置为任何值，尝试将 属性设置为 `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` 会引发异常。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. `XmlSchemaForm.None`的默认值指示 检查 XML 文档的架构，以确定该命名空间是否是限定的。The default value, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 对于元素， 会检查 schema 元素特性 `elementFormDefault`的值。For elements, the checks the value of the schema-element attribute `elementFormDefault`. 对于属性，它将检查架构元素属性 `attributeFormDefault`的值。For attributes, it checks the value of the schema-element attribute `attributeFormDefault`. 例如，下面的 XML 架构指示 `Name` 元素是限定的，而 `Number` 元素是非限定的。For example, the following XML Schema indicates that the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例将 `Vehicle` 类的 属性设置为 `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`，并将 `Car` 类的 属性设置为 `XmlSchemaForm.Qualified`。The following example sets the property for the `Vehicle` class to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`, and the property for the `Car` class to `XmlSchemaForm.Qualified`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否必须将成员序列化为 属性设置为 的 XML 空标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member as an empty XML tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 生成 特性，则为 ；否则为 ，且不生成实例。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, , and no instance is generated.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档显式通知缺少某个元素的内容。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 此类元素包含 `xsi:nil` 设置为 `true`的属性。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅名为[XML 架构第1部分：结构](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/)的万维网联合会规范。For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium specification titled [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/). 如果 `true` 属性，则为已设置为 `null`的类成员生成 `xsi:nil` 特性。If the property is `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如，如果将名为 `MyStringArray` 的字段设置为 `null`，则 生成以下 XML 代码。For example, if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果 `false` 属性，则不会生成 XML 元素。If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated. > [!NOTE] > 由于值类型不能包含 `null`，因此无法将 属性应用于类型为值类型的成员。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为 `Group`的类进行序列化，该类包含一个名为 `Employees` 的字段，该字段返回 `Employee` 对象的数组。The following example serializes a class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Employees` that returns an array of `Employee` objects. 名为 `Manager` 的第二个类派生自 `Employee`。A second class named `Manager` derives from `Employee`. 指定 可以将 `Employee` 和 `Manager` 对象插入到数组中。An specifies that the can insert both `Employee` and `Manager` objects into the array. 该示例设置 属性，因此，通知 不要在设置为 `null`的数组中生成 `xsi:nil` 特性对象。The example sets the property, thereby telling the not to generate the `xsi:nil` attribute objects in the array set to `null`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the generated XML element.

value.span: 生成的 XML 元素的命名空间。

span.span: The namespace of the generated XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性符合[XML 中万维网联合会规范命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/)。The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium specification [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/). 若要创建要在 XML 文档中使用的命名空间和关联的前缀，必须创建包含所有前缀和命名空间对的 。To create namespaces to use in the XML document and associated prefixes, you must create an that contains all the prefix and namespace pairs. 为每个 设置的命名空间必须包含在 中。The namespace you set for each must be contained in the . 当 生成文档时，它会为每个数组项的元素名称提供正确的前缀。When the generates the document, it correctly prefixes the element name for each array item. ## Examples 下面的示例将应用 并设置 属性。The following example applies an and sets the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int NestingLevel { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.NestingLevel : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置受 影响的 XML 元素的层次结构中的级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the level in a hierarchy of XML elements that the affects.

value.span: 数组的数组中的索引集从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of a set of indexes in an array of arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 文档可以包含 XML 元素的层次结构。An XML document can contain hierarchies of XML elements. 若要表示此类层次结构，请使用数组的数组。To represent such a hierarchy, an array of arrays is used. 在此类数组中，每个索引表示层次结构中的一个级别。In such an array, each index represents a level in the hierarchy. 因此，仅当向返回数组数组的字段应用 时，才使用 属性。Therefore, the property is only used when applying an to a field that returns an array of arrays. 应用属性时，通过设置 来指定属性影响的层次结构级别。When applying the attribute, specify which hierarchy level the attribute affects by setting the . 第一个索引的值始终为 0;因此，可以选择设置其 -- 不将 值应用于第一个数组索引。The first index always has the value of 0; therefore it is optional to set its --an without a value is applied to the first array index. 只有后续 对象需要指定 值（如1、2、3等等）。Only the subsequent objects require values specified (as 1, 2, 3, and so forth). ## Examples 下面的示例将三个 特性应用到数组的数组。The following example applies three attributes to an array of arrays. 若要指定每个属性应用于哪个数组， 属性设置为数组的索引。To specify which of the arrays each attribute applies to, the property is set to the index of the arrays. [!code-cpp[NestingLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NestingLevel/cpp/nestinglevel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NestingLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NestingLevel/CS/nestinglevel.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.Type : Type with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置数组中允许的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type allowed in an array.
A that is allowed in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为公共字段或公共读/写属性值指定一个重写的类型。Use the property to specify an overridden type for a public field or public read/write property value. 如果字段或属性返回 类型的数组，请将 的多个实例应用于字段或属性。If a field or property returns an array of type , apply multiple instances of the to the field or property. 对于每个实例，将 属性设置为可插入到数组中的对象的类型。For each instance, set the property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array. 如果数组仅包含基元类型，则不需要应用 。If an array contains only primitive types, you do not need to apply the . 默认情况下， 生成一系列元素，每个元素都具有相同的元素名称，每个值对应于每个值，但每个元素的类型都设置为 XML 架构数据类型。By default, the generates a series of elements, each with the same element name, for each value, but the type of each element is set to the XML Schema data type. 例如，以下代码：For example, the following code: ``` ' Visual Basic code Public Class Arrays Public XSDTypes ()As Object= New Object(){"one", 2, 3.0} End Class // C# code public class MyArray{ // No XmlArrayItemAttribute is applied. public object[] XSDTypes= new object[]{"one", 2, 3.2}; } ``` 此 XML 中的结果：results in this XML: ``` ``` 但是，如果为每个基元类型指定 属性，则每个值的元素名称都是使用 .NET 类型名称生成的。However, if you specify the property for each primitive type, the element name for each value is generated using the .NET type name. 例如，以下代码：For example this code: ``` ' Visual Basic code Public Class Arrays _ Public PrimitiveTypes () As Object = New Object(){"one", 2, 3.0} End Class // C# code public class Arrays{ [XmlArrayItem(typeof(string))] [XmlArrayItem(typeof(int))] [XmlArrayItem(typeof(double))] public object [] PrimitiveTypes = new object[]{"one", 2, 3.0}; } ``` 此 XML 中的结果：results in this XML: ``` one 2 3 ``` ## Examples 下面的示例序列化对象的数组。The following example serializes an array of objects. 返回数组的字段具有两个 实例。The field that returns the array is attributed with two instances. 每个实例都指示 接受数组中的指定 。Each instance instructs the to accept the specified in the array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
